description: Climate Change Mitigation entitled: "Sustainable Urban Transport Programme"

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Reduce the growth trajectory of Green House Gas emissions from the transport sector in India through the promotion of environmentally sustainable urban transport, strengthening government capacity to plan, finance, implement, operate and manage climate friendly and sustainable urban transport interventions at national, state and city levels, and increasing the modal share of environmentally friendly transport modes in project cities.
subproject.title: Sustainable Urban Transport

title: Sustainable Urban Transport  Programme
